tags.name: expansion-panel
tags.description: A custom element similar to the HTML5 `<details>` element.

attributes.name: opened
attributes.description: When true, the panel content is expanded and visible

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Disabled panel can not be expanded or collapsed

attributes.name: focused
attributes.description: State attribute set when element has focus.

attributes.name: focus-ring
attributes.description: State attribute set when focused from keyboard.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: When true, the panel content is expanded and visible

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Disabled panel can not be expanded or collapsed

cssParts.name: toggle
cssParts.description: A toggle button, child of the header part.

tags.name: fancy-accordion
tags.description:
A custom element implementing the accordion widget: a vertically stacked set of expandable panels
that wraps several instances of the `<expansion-panel>` element. Only one panel can be opened
(expanded) at a time.

Panel headings function as controls that enable users to open (expand) or hide (collapse) their
associated sections of content. The user can toggle panels by mouse click, Enter and Space keys.

The component supports keyboard navigation and is aligned with the
[WAI-ARIA Authoring Practices](https://www.w3.org/TR/wai-aria-practices-1.1/#accordion).

attributes.name: opened-index
attributes.description:
Index of the currently opened panel. By default all the panels are closed.
Only one panel can be opened at the same time. Setting `null` or `undefined`
closes all the accordion panels.

properties.name: openedIndex
properties.description:
Index of the currently opened panel. By default all the panels are closed.
Only one panel can be opened at the same time. Setting `null` or `undefined`
closes all the accordion panels.

events.name: opened-index-changed
events.description: Event fired when changing currently opened panel.

tags.name: intl-currency
tags.description: A custom element that formats currency using Intl.

tags.name: progress-bar
tags.description: A custom element similar to the HTML5 `<progress>` element.

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Minimum bound of the progress bar.

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Maximum bound of the progress bar.

attributes.name: indeterminate
attributes.description:
Indeterminate state of the progress bar.
This property takes precedence over other state properties (min, max, value).

properties.name: min
properties.description: Minimum bound of the progress bar.

properties.name: max
properties.description: Maximum bound of the progress bar.

properties.name: indeterminate
properties.description:
Indeterminate state of the progress bar.
This property takes precedence over other state properties (min, max, value).

cssProperties.name: --progress-bar-fill-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the filled progress bar part.

cssProperties.name: --progress-bar-opacity
cssProperties.description: Opacity set on the underlying track.
